faq.question: How do I start using the app?
faq.answer: Just download the app, enter your display name, and create or join a couple with a code.

faq.question: Can I change the anniversary date?
faq.answer: Yes, you can edit the start date from the settings or profile screen.

faq.question: How to share the anniversary with my partner?
faq.answer: From the main screen, tap the share button to generate a commemorative image to share.

faq.question: Is the app free?
faq.answer: Yes, Together App is completely free. Premium features may be added later.

faq.question: I lost my data. How do I recover it?
faq.answer: If you signed in with an account, your data is backed up to the cloud. Just sign in again.

faq.question: Can I change the background or theme?
faq.answer: Yes, go to Theme Editor to pick your favorite background and colors.

faq.question: Can I use the app on multiple devices?
faq.answer: Yes, sign in with the same account to sync your data across devices.

faq.question: How do I connect with my partner?
faq.answer: The creator of the couple will receive a code. The other user enters this code to join.

faq.question: How do I delete a couple?
faq.answer: Go to pairing settings and select 'Delete couple'. Confirmation will be required.

faq.question: How can I send feedback or report a bug?
faq.answer: Please email us at dxh125@gmail.com . We welcome all feedback!
